sub_title: Regional Manager Credit Risk & Receivables at Elsevier
summary: Solution-oriented Credit and Collections Manager with extensive experience in end-to-end Order-to-Cash (OTC) processes, including credit management, debt collections, and cash applications. Proven record of leading global OTC teams, implementing transformations, process improvements, and driving operational excellence. Strong expertise in ERP systems, process automation, and cross-functional collaboration. Excellent financial analysis and critical thinking skills with a strategic mindset to mitigate credit risk, reduce DSO, and increase cash conversion.
